articles.title: How Michael Keaton's Batman Will Reunite the DC Cinematic Universe! (Nerdist News w/ Dan Casey) - Nerdist
articles.description: With news of Michael Keaton reportedly in talks to return as Batman for the upcoming Flash movie, an exciting new world of possibilities seem to be opening u...
